message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one taking the risk of negotiation!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, take it or leave it!
I'm getting closer to your offer, but I still want a bit more!
I'm taking control, you can either accept or walk away!
I'm making one last attempt to get a fair deal, let's see if you'll meet me in the middle!
